agreement_COD_STATE: select codeval2 codeval, codeval2 codetxt from {{schema}}.ucod2_country_state where codeval1='USA' and (codetdt is null or (codetdt is not null and codetdt > getdate())) order by codseq,codeval2
agreement_COD_MONTH: select month_txt as codeval,month_txt as codetxt from {{schema}}.v_months order by month_val
agreement_COD_YEAR: select year_val as codeval,year_val as codetxt from {{schema}}.v_years order by year_val
agreement_sign: update c set c_atstmp=getdate() where c_id=@c_id;
insert into {{schema}}.rqst(rqst_source, rqst_atype, rqst_aname, rqst_parms) values('CLIENT', 'REPORT', 'AGREEMENT',@rqst_parms);
insert into {{schema}}.rqst_d(rqst_id, d_scope, d_scope_id, d_ctgr, d_desc) values(@rqst_id, 'C',@c_id, 'AGREEMNT', 'Customer Portal Agreement');
agreement_paymentresult: select pacc_sts,pacc_pp_result,c_pre.c_id,c_pre.pe_id,new_client_result,pe_ll_tstmp from c_pre left outer join {{schema}}.cpe on c_pre.pe_id=cpe.pe_id where c_pre_id=@payment_id and pacc_fp_hash=@fp_hash;
agreement_cod_c_id: select c_id as codeval,c_name as codetxt from C where 1=1 %%%DATALOCKS%%% order by c_name
agreement_report_N: select n.c_id,n_type,n_eu,format(n_etstmp,'MM/dd/yyyy') as n_etstmp,n_note from {{schema}}.n inner join c on c.c_id=n.c_id where n.c_id=@c_id %%%DATALOCKS%%%
